knimeNode.name: CWL Port to JSON
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a data table with a cell containing the JSON content of a CWL port.

fullDescription.intro: This node writes the content of a CWL port to a KNIME table as a JSON cell.

ports.inPort: A CWL object to put into the table.
ports.outPort: A table with a JSON cell containing the CWL port's content.
